edu.nps.moves.xmlpg
Class Xmlpg

java.lang.Object
  edu.nps.moves.xmlpg.Xmlpg

public class Xmlpg
extends java.lang.Object

A class that reads an XML file in a specific format, and spits out a Java or C++ class that does most of the work of the class.

This can probably be done via an XSLT, but the learning curve on that looks fairly steep for the small, short-term project I'm working on.

There is a huge risk of name overloading here, as many of the terms such as "class" are also used by java or c++.

In effect this is sort of like generating an abstract syntax tree, then compiling it to some "target" language, in this case either C++ or Java.

Author:
DMcG
